panels.title: Drone Positions
panels.description: Shows the current positions of all active drones. Marker color represents status (OK, Low Battery, Failure), marker size represents battery level.

targets.rawSql: SELECT lat, lon, status, battery, cluster_id, drone_id FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv})

panels.title: Total Active Drones
panels.description: Shows the total number of drones reporting telemetry in the selected time range.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT drone_id) AS total_drones FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv})

panels.title: Average Battery Level
panels.description: Shows the average battery level across all active drones.

targets.rawSql: SELECT AVG(battery) AS avg_battery FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv})

panels.title: Recent Telemetry
panels.description: Shows the 50 most recent telemetry records for troubleshooting and detailed analysis.

targets.rawSql: SELECT ts, cluster_id, drone_id, lat, lon, alt, battery, status FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv}) ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 50

panels.title: Active Missions
panels.description: Displays the currently running missions based on the configuration.

targets.rawSql: SELECT id, name, objective, description, region_name FROM mission_metadata

panels.title: Drone Velocity
panels.description: Displays velocity vectors between consecutive telemetry points.

targets.rawSql: SELECT lat, lon, LAG(lat) OVER (PARTITION BY drone_id ORDER BY ts) AS prev_lat, LAG(lon) OVER (PARTITION BY drone_id ORDER BY ts) AS prev_lon FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv})

panels.title: Flight Corridors
panels.description: Predefined flight corridor paths for missions.

panels.title: Altitude Distribution
panels.description: Histogram showing distribution of drone altitude values.

targets.rawSql: SELECT alt FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv})

panels.title: Battery Life Distribution
panels.description: Histogram showing battery level distribution across drones.

targets.rawSql: SELECT battery FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv})

panels.title: Swarm Density Heatmap
panels.description: Heatmap showing density of drone positions.

targets.rawSql: SELECT FLOOR(lat*10)/10 AS grid_lat, FLOOR(lon*10)/10 AS grid_lon, COUNT(*) AS density FROM drone_telemetry WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND cluster_id IN (${cluster_id:csv}) GROUP BY grid_lat, grid_lon
